learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Success and Achievement vocabulary
Apply B2 Present Perfect Simple vs Continuous structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: I ______ (read) this book for three hours.

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: She ______ (finish) her homework already.
